definition: variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
the solid and broken lines of the eight trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], e.g. ☶
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to correct (in writing) sb's errors or misconceptions

sentences.english: We are waiting for the transshipment containers from the feeder barge being loaded to this voyage.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在等卸支線駁的中專集裝箱轉裝到本航次上。

sentences.english: Mrs Linton spoke strongly, and yet I can't contradict her.
sentences.chinese: 林惇夫人說得過火些，可我駁不倒她。

sentences.english: The material of the balustrade bracket series is Stainless Steel 304 or 316.
sentences.chinese: 扶手駁接件的材質爲優質304或316不鏽鋼。

sentences.english: Is the employee parking area separated from the shipping and receiving yards?
sentences.chinese: 設備的員工休息區域是和接貨駁，發貨駁分開的嗎？

sentences.english: Is the employee parking area separated from the shipping and receiving yards?
sentences.chinese: 設備的員工休息區域是和接貨駁，發貨駁分開的嗎？

sentences.english: He's going to need some irrefutable proof before he'll be willing to bend.
sentences.chinese: 他只會在不可辨駁的證據下才會願意屈服。

definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to fix a date (for an event)/to select an auspicious date
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
